titles.title: E85 and Biodiesel Access Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage increased access to alternative fuels.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/31/2008--Introduced. E85 and Biodiesel Access Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to set forth a special rule for increasing the tax credit for alternative fuel vehicle commercial refueling property expenditures in states in which 15% of the retail fuel facilities store and dispense clean-burning fuel.
